remarks: Closure of map from vectors to functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmapcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapcl.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapcl.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
hdmapcl.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapcl.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
hdmapcl $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` T ) e. D ) $.
